title: S&P; Global (SPGI) Q3 2023 Earnings Call Transcript - The Motley Fool
summary: S&P Global reported 11% revenue growth in the third quarter, excluding the impact of Engineering Solutions. The company saw acceleration in revenue growth in every division this quarter. S&P Global raised its adjusted EPS guidance by approximately $0.10 at the midpoint to reflect the better-than-expected results through the third quarter.
